name: config-vitest-setup
description: Vitest unit test config with MSW mocks, React Testing Library, coverage, and factory helpers
postMessage:
Install: npm i -D vitest @testing-library/react @testing-library/jest-dom @testing-library/user-event msw jsdom @vitejs/plugin-react
Run: npx vitest
Watch: npx vitest --watch
Coverage: npx vitest --coverage
UI: npx vitest --ui
